# Angular Blockchain Visualizer - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview

Educational blockchain visualizer built with Angular 18+ demonstrating proof-of-work mining, transaction pooling, and blockchain formation.

## Project Status

- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md - Created workspace instructions
- [ ] Clarify Project Requirements - Angular 18+ Blockchain Visualizer
- [ ] Scaffold the Project - Create Angular CLI project
- [ ] Customize the Project - Implement blockchain components
- [ ] Install Required Extensions - Angular Language Service
- [ ] Compile the Project - Install dependencies
- [ ] Create and Run Task - Setup dev server task
- [ ] Launch the Project - Start Angular dev server
- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete - Finalize README

## Architecture

- Standalone Angular components (no NgModules)
- Signal-based state management
- Services for blockchain logic
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- crypto-js for SHA256 hashing
